sentences.en: During the recession, training budgets were seen as an expendable luxury.
sentences.cn: 在经济衰退期间，培训预算被认为是一项可以节省下来的奢侈费用。

sentences.en: He called for much higher spending on education and training.
sentences.cn: 他呼吁在教育和培训方面加大投入。

sentences.en: I'd had the training to suss out what he was up to.
sentences.cn: 我参加培训是想搞清楚他居心何在。

sentences.en: Lean hard-training women athletes may men-struate less frequently or not at all.
sentences.cn: 身材瘦削而且训练艰苦的女运动员行经可能不那么频繁，或者根本不来月经。

sentences.en: My professional training has taught me to look at things logically.
sentences.cn: 专业训练使我懂得看问题要讲求逻辑。

sentences.en: New recruits have been undergoing training in recent weeks.
sentences.cn: 最近几周，新兵正在接受训练。

sentences.en: On-the-job training will be supplemented by classroom lectures.
sentences.cn: 除了在职培训，还将有课堂授课作为补充。

sentences.en: Police drivers have to undergo intensive training .
sentences.cn: 警察驾驶员都得接受强化训练。

sentences.en: She loved singing as a child and started vocal training at 12.
sentences.cn: 她从小就喜欢唱歌，12岁开始了声乐训练。

sentences.en: She'll make a good actress, if she gets the right training.
sentences.cn: 如果训练得当，她会成为一名出色的演员。

sentences.en: Staff problems should be addressed through training and appraisals.
sentences.cn: 职员问题应该通过培训和考核评定来解决。

sentences.en: The emphasis is on developing fitness through exercises and training.
sentences.cn: 重点在于通过锻炼促进健康。

sentences.en: The shop opens late on Fridays because of staff training .
sentences.cn: 因为员工培训，这家商店周五较晚开门营业。

sentences.en: The teacher training college put up a plaque to the college's founder.
sentences.cn: 那所教师培训学院为该学院的创立者立了一块纪念牌匾。

sentences.en: The training covers extended periods in obstetrics and gynaecology.
sentences.cn: 该培训包括产科学和妇科学的增加课时。

sentences.en: Their lack of training could put members of the public at risk.
sentences.cn: 他们缺乏训练，这有可能会使民众面临风险。

sentences.en: Women must receive their fair share of training for good-paying jobs.
sentences.cn: 女性必须获得她们理应得到的高薪工作培训。

sentences.en: You could never eliminate risk, but preparation and training could attenuate it.
sentences.cn: 风险不可能完全消除，但可以通过防范和培训来降低。
